title: POPCAAN - "Where We Came From" 2014 [mp3 @ VBR]
description:
The best dancehall album of the year so far is also, interestingly, one of the best pop albums of the year. Popcaan, aka Andre Jay Sutherland, is the current leader in the neverending battle for supremacy among Jamaican deejays, but unlike previous kings of the hill (most recently, Mavado and Vybz Kartel, the latter who also has functioned as SutherlandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mentor) heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not overly concerned with projecting the image of a badman. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a lover, not a gangster, and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an impressively broad kind of love that heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s putting out. Where We Come From is a party, and everyoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s invited.
